description: The driver of the car involved, a man in his late 20s, was arrested and is currently in hospital.
title: Italian Alps: Six German tourists killed by 'drunk driver'
title_page: Italian Alps: Six German tourists killed by 'drunk driver' - BBC News
maintext: Last weekend, three skiers - a woman and two girls - were killed by an avalanche in South Tyrol. They were also believed to be German.
